Articles.Content: How in the world is this done? Center of gravity? Kerbals taking turns throwing themselves against the wall?

Reaction wheels longbyte1, or Control Moment Gyroscopes

The VAB tutorial even mentions that the Mk1 pod contains a trial version of the SAS.

Shift mass around the centre of mass. If you have a 360 degree chair and something heavy you can spin around in circles by holding out the heavy object to the side moving it to the other side, then back to the centre, repeat.

And as for the power source behind the motors and/or Kerbal acrobatics involved, well, this one day Jeb found a small jar of expired mayonnaise in his junkyard and decided to set it on fire...

(In other words, it's free unlimited energy in-game.)
